column1: Still nowhere near prime Bron, ad, Russ, Dwight, melo, gasol and chaundee brown

Lakers actually have 6 guys that meet the criteria of this post.   THT, Monk, Austin Reaves, Joel Ayayi, Chaundee Brown, and Mac McClung.

Yeah, that‚Äôs the double-edged sword of the Lakers: the location and winning tradition means player development takes a back seat to FA and trades to win now.  The scouting department is outstanding, but player development needs THT to have a big year and Kuzma to be great for Washington in order to look as good.
